item.description:
Gail is heading up a couple of singles meetup groups going ice skating tomorrow afternoon in Newport. If you belong to Over 45 Narragansett Singles group, you can see all the details there or I'll email you if you're interested. I wrote more on their discussion board with more specific details re parking, etc. - Let me know - Gail

Read all the details at http://www.meetup.com...

As of now, there are 10 members signed up. I hope that you can join us!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the ticket booth. Gail will have a Meetup sign.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Ice Skating in Newport Sunday afternoon
